00013     G4VPhysicalVolume* DetectorConstruction::Construct() {
00014         auxInfoReader_->readGlobalAuxInfo();
00015         auxInfoReader_->assignAuxInfoToVolumes();
00016         return parser_->GetWorldVolume();
00017     }

00019     void DetectorConstruction::ConstructSDandField() {
00020 
00021         if (BiasingMessenger::isBiasingEnabled()) {
00022 
00023             // Instantiate the biasing operator
00024             // TODO: At some point, this should be more generic i.e. operators should be
00025             //       similar to plugins.
00026             XsecBiasingOperator* xsecBiasing = new XsecBiasingOperator("XsecBiasingOperator");
00027 
00028             for (G4LogicalVolume* volume : *G4LogicalVolumeStore::GetInstance()) {
00029                 G4String volumeName = volume->GetName();
00030                 //std::cout << "[ DetectorConstruction ]: " << "Volume: " << volume->GetName() << std::endl;
00031                 if ((BiasingMessenger::getVolume().compare("ecal") == 0) 
00032                         && (volumeName.contains("Wthick") 
00033                             || volumeName.contains("Si")
00034                             || volumeName.contains("W")) 
00035                         && volumeName.contains("volume")) {
00036                     xsecBiasing->AttachTo(volume);
00037                     std::cout << "[ DetectorConstruction ]: " << "Attaching biasing operator " 
00038                               << xsecBiasing->GetName() << " to volume " 
00039                               << volume->GetName() << std::endl;
00040                 } else if (volumeName.contains(BiasingMessenger::getVolume())) {
00041                     xsecBiasing->AttachTo(volume);
00042                     std::cout << "[ DetectorConstruction ]: " 
00043                               << "Attaching biasing operator " << xsecBiasing->GetName() 
00044                               << " to volume " << volume->GetName() << std::endl;
00045                 }
00046             }
00047         }
00048     }
00049 }
